attributes.action: create a better rural transport system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i live on the borders of two counties my bus service has been reduced to three buses a day i was given a bus pass but know i find it is  impossible to use because of the lack of buses i have to pay £2.30 to travel 2 miles to my drs, we are all being told to use public transport but the goverment must do more to encourage the use of public transport.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
